summary: **Beverly Hills, 90210** is an American TV show about a group of friends growing up in Beverly Hills, California. It ran from 1990 to 2000 and followed the twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh as they moved from Minnesota and experienced life in a new, wealthy city. The show tackled important issues like relationships, drugs, and violence. It became very popular, making stars of Jason Priestley, Luke Perry, Shannen Doherty, and Jennie Garth. The series had many cast changes and was rebooted in 2019 as **BH90210**, but it was canceled after one season.
title: Beverly Hills, 90210
